name: provider
description: LLM provider: openai, anthropic, gemini, custom

name: is_custom
description: True if user-added custom model pricing

name: is_enabled
description: User can enable/disable model for cost tracking

name: x_openai_batch_input_price
description: OpenAI-specific: Batch API input price per 1K

name: x_openai_batch_output_price
description: OpenAI-specific: Batch API output price per 1K

name: pricing_type
description: Pricing classification: standard, free_tier, volume_discount, committed_use, promotional, negotiated

name: free_tier_input_tokens
description: Free tier input token allowance per reset period (null = no free tier)

name: free_tier_output_tokens
description: Free tier output token allowance per reset period (null = no free tier)

name: free_tier_reset_frequency
description: Free tier reset frequency: daily, monthly, never (one-time credit)

name: discount_reason
description: Reason for discount: volume, commitment, promotion, negotiated, trial

name: volume_threshold_tokens
description: Minimum monthly tokens to qualify for this pricing tier

name: base_input_price_per_1k
description: Reference standard price before discount (for comparison)

name: base_output_price_per_1k
description: Reference standard price before discount (for comparison)
